Text.SourceString: <TYPE>SPRAYS</> <DIVIDER>//</> <BOLD>PRESS</> <ACTION NAME="Spray" WIDTH="30" HEIGHT="30" PADDING="0 5 0 0"/> on a wall or a floor to spray your emblem in a match for other players to see.
<TYPE>EMOTE</> <DIVIDER>//</> <BOLD>PRESS</> <ACTION NAME="PLAYEMOTE" WIDTH="30" HEIGHT="30" PADDING="0 5 0 0"/> before, after, or during a match to emote.
<TYPE>INSPECT</> <DIVIDER>//</> <BOLD>PRESS</> <ACTION NAME="INSPECT" WIDTH="30" HEIGHT="30" PADDING="0 5 0 0"/> in a match to inspect your weapon.
